overview: A young boy named Jack goes on an adventure he will never forget!  Jack's mother says he must sell their pet cow, Old Bess, so they won't starve to death. A giant, a hen that lays golden eggs, a singing harp and more!  Will Jack make it home safely?
tagline: Jack and the beanstalk fairytale with bloopers
title: Jack & The Beanstalk Ruby's Storytime
